ECClass.description: Assembly of P&ID components that make up a complex component or system. The components can be treated as single object or as individual objects based on insertion settings. The PID Assembly is the base assembly type for all P&ID assembly types.

Assembly of collinear P&ID Inline components that make up a complex inline component or system. The components can be treated as single object or as individual objects based on insertion settings. The PID Inline Assembly is the base assembly type for all PID Inline assembly types.
